content.text: A framework that creates a human-like relationship

We’re not just designing screens and instructions. We’re creating a human-like relationship. It means you need to show up. You’re also a character in the user’s story. It also means declaring your desires in the relationship. Showing up in the relationship and connecting with them is not optional.
This framework of needs and desires is meant to help you deeply understand our users and how you show up beyond the adjectives that describe your character:
